    Class Test1

    Unit tests for the AppCanvas class.

    This class verifies the coordinate tracking, drawing commands, and state management of the custom BOOSE canvas implementation.

    Methods

    DrawTo()

    Tests that the canvas moves its drawing position to the specified coordinates when DrawTo is called.

    Declaration
    [TestMethod("C:\\Users\\ellio\\source\\repos\\ase-boose-assignment-RainbowSlime818\\BOOSEapp\\BOOSEUnitTest\\Test1.cs", 40)]
public void DrawTo()
    Remarks

    Verifies that after invoking DrawTo with given x and y values, the canvas's position properties reflect the new coordinates. This test ensures correct behavior of the DrawTo method in updating the canvas state.

    MoveTo()

    Tests that the MoveTo method correctly updates the canvas position to the specified coordinates.

    Declaration
    [TestMethod("C:\\Users\\ellio\\source\\repos\\ase-boose-assignment-RainbowSlime818\\BOOSEapp\\BOOSEUnitTest\\Test1.cs", 64)]
public void MoveTo()
    Remarks

    Verifies that after calling MoveTo with given x and y values, the canvas's Xpos and Ypos properties reflect the new position. This test ensures the MoveTo method functions as expected when moving the canvas.

    MultiMove()

    Verifies that multiple move and draw operations on the canvas update its position as expected.

    Declaration
    [TestMethod("C:\\Users\\ellio\\source\\repos\\ase-boose-assignment-RainbowSlime818\\BOOSEapp\\BOOSEUnitTest\\Test1.cs", 87)]
public void MultiMove()
    Remarks

    This test method checks the correctness of the canvas's position after performing a sequence of MoveTo and DrawTo operations. It ensures that the canvas's X and Y coordinates reflect the intended values after each operation.

    Setup()

    Initializes resources before each test method is run.

    Creates a fresh 1000x1000 AppCanvas instance to ensure tests do not interfere with each other.

    Declaration
    [TestInitialize]
public void Setup()
